description: A utility header defining an inline function getRFCConfig within the Utils namespace to retrieve RFC configuration parameters using a function getRFCParameter and a data structure RFC_ParamData_t.

methods.name: bool getRFCConfig(const char * paramName,RFC_ParamData_t & paramOutput)
methods.description: Inline function that retrieves RFC parameters given a parameter name and stores the result in paramOutput, returning true if successful.

ctags.name: getRFCConfig
ctags.pattern: /^inline bool getRFCConfig(const char* paramName, RFC_ParamData_t& paramOutput)$/
